email.description: The email used to register with

first_name.description: The first name of the person registering for the partner company

last_name.description: The last name of the person registering for the partner company

third_party_type.description:
The third party market place integration platform the company is using.  If you are a merchant integrating directly with Jet, please leave this blank.

            #Valid Values
            * ChannelAdvisor
            * CommerceHub

vip_code.description: A registration code from the Retail Partners team to accelerate the registration process

legal_name.description: The legal name the partner's business is registered with

display_name.description: The name the partner wants to be shown on Jet.com

dba_name.description: The name the partner uses to operate

phone_number.description: The main contact phone number for the partner company

address2.description: A secondary description for the partner address

city.description: The city for the partner address

state.description: The state for the partner address (please abbreviate)

zip_code.description: The zip code for the partner address
